1.content: Which character do you want to fatten up?
1.title: Who to pick?

111.content:
Dipper pines was a smart 12 year old boy who had a thing for the supernatural
He dedicated himself to finding monsters and revealing the truth about them.
He wanted to be known as the boy who discovered monsters

One day Dipper found an interesting case about a local ghost.
Dipper read up about this old mansion on a hill that was long abandoned
It once belonged to a rich family.

It was said the parents became crazy and fattened up there 1 year old daughter making her into a huge room filling blob.
Somehow the parents got squished under the blob babies fat ass.
Once the three was found by police they helped move the girl with a crane and took the parents to the local Hospital in order to save them but they passed away not long after.
The daughter was too young to know about this and spent the rest of her childhood slowly losing weight but she never did get trully skinny again.
Ever since then the house has said to be haunted to the ghosts of the parents

Dipper got excited hoping maybe he could capture footage of these ghosts.
He told Mabel about his plan but was disappointed to find Mabel was having friends over for a sleep over so she couldn't come.
Dipper was annoyed he had to go alone but he was still determined to get footage of these ghosts.
Dipper then went to the large house breaking in and going around taken pictures and filming what he saw
Dipper was hoping to see some ghosts but found there was nothing.

He soon came up the bedroom upstairs
That's when he heard a voice say "A child is here"
Dipper looked around but no one was there.
Another voice said "It's a boy though. I was hoping for a girl"
Another voice said "Don't be picky he will do just fine."
Dipper felt hands grab at him and he panic trying to free himself from the invisible force.

Dipper was shocked when.....
111.title: Story 1

choices: The ghost couple gave him some new clothes.
Suddenly, Mabel came in to rescue him!
1113.content:
Dipper suddenly felt his body growing smaller, quickly realizing he was regressing from his 12-year-old age into a toddler, then into a baby, and soon became a cute, adorable newborn baby! He was plopped down onto the soft bed as the sounds of his invisible captors gawked at his youthful body.
"Aww, he looks so cute as a baby!" A voice mentioned, now more noticeably female.
"I told you, dear. All babies look adorable, no matter what their gender." The male voice spoke up, patting Dipper on the head. "Especially once they're made nice and plump!"
"Wh-what?" Dipper asked in a high-pitched voice.
"Now, now. Don't be fussy, baby. We'll make sure you get all the food you can eat!" The father spoke.
Suddenly, Dipper noticed several piles of food appear before him with a faint, blue glow. The food began to levitate towards him magically, stuffing themselves into his mouth and forcing him to chew them down. He couldn't help himself, not only was he admittedly hungry, but the food was just too good to resist!
"Good boy, eat up! You'll make a fine blob... Just like dear Patricia..." The female voice smiled, poking Dipper's belly as it expanded outwards.

The food Dipper ate was far larger than his infantile body, causing his weight gain to occur much more rapidly than would be expected. His body spread across the bed, quickly becoming difficult for him to move around more than a weak jiggle. This futile jiggling only made the two ghostly parents love him more, and the food only increased in size and speed.
"Mrrphg..." Dipper groaned, watching in desperation as his once skinny, pre-teen body quickly bloated into a gigantic exercise ball of newborn fattiness.

As he ate his little naked baby body swelled with fat. his belly ballooned out across his lap becoming big and round. his arms and legs become plump. he grew cute girl like boy boobs and his ass was filling the bed and he grew 2 chins and big puffy cheeks.

"We'll make you into the fat blob we never could turn Patricia into..." The female voice doted, stuffing a huge amount of food into Dipper's mouth. "You'll be bigger than she ever was!"
"Mrrphh!" Dipper struggled to get a word in, but he just couldn't fight through all the blubber he had packed on, not the mention the large funnel of food constantly being shoved into him.

The newborn Dipper was at the mercy of these two feedee ghosts, stuffing him with more and more until...

choices: Dipper finally stopped regressing at atomic size.
Dipper woke up on the bed in the mansion, it was just a strange dream... Right?
11131122.content:
Somehow, someway, Dipper felt himself regressing even further. Not to any form of pre-birth state, but... Younger in ways Human Beings have never experienced. His cuteness and natural tininess became exaggerated to absolute insane amounts, reaching an age only describable as negative. If he weren't such a gigantic, mansion-sized baby, he would surely be less than a foot tall, and only shrinking in size!
And yet, despite his age lowering younger and younger, going from -10 to -100, all the way to the -1000's, he was still getting fatter, and much quicker, too! His appetite and metabolism seemed to be going absolutely bonkers, like a computer system attempting to load some nonexistent, contradictory code.
His new Ghost Parents were never prouder, their baby son growing into such an absolutely massive, young blob. Despite his head being now the size of a baseball, with cheeks larger than cars, he was now only conceivable as a mountainous range of adipose and flab.
"Our son is so adorable! We need to make him fatter!" The woman stated.
"And even younger, as well!" The male added.
"Fatter... Younger... Fatter... Younger..." They repeated as Dipper quickly outgrew the mansion, and resumed swelling out into the forest beyond.

Dipper could feed the trees beneath him, though he was now encased in a massive wall of his own obesity, blinded by blubber. He still felt very sad, he wondered how he must be like a monster now, crushing everything underneath his negative-age butt.
It wasn't long until...
11131122.title: Younger Than Young.

Dipper had aged as far backwards as humanly possible without him vanishing

1113112213.content:
Suddenly, Dipper woke back up in the mansion, completely unchanged and skinny. It seemed Mabel was there with him, trying to wake him up.
"There you are, silly! You ran into this big house earlier, and you didn't come out for hours." Mabel explained. "I'm glad you're alright, though!"
Dipper rubbed his head. "Ough... What happened? I had the strangest dream..."
"Don't worry about that, bro. Let's just get home, alright?" Mabel offered, picking Dipper up out of the old bed.

Dipper figured what happened had to have been just a long, odd dream, rubbing his head groggily. Yet he still felt as if there were some kind of presence in the house, as though the two feeder parents haven't left him. They didn't seem to be doing anything yet, so as long as they could get out of the mansion, he would presumably be safe.

That is... IF he could leave the mansion.
1113112213.title: Dipper woke up was it all a dream?

Dipper and Mabel where going to leave. but Dipper couldn't shake that dream it felt so real he felt so soft and fat only a few minutes ago so what the hell happened?

111311221312.content:
The two were so preoccupied with stuffing their faces that they didn't even notice their ages slowly regressing, shrinking down from 12-year-olds to 10-year-olds, then down to 5, 4, 2, all the way to becoming obese newborns. Their stomachs growled for more all the way through, however, and their feasting had not stopped even when they became tiny, fatty babies.
"Mrrph... Mo'!" Mabel squeaked in a high-pitched voice, mouth full of burgers.
Even Dipper had become as gluttonous, joining his sister in a hunger-induced rampage on this food, which didn't seem to be running out any time soon. Their clothes stretched out, revealing several folds of their blubbery bodies, spilling outwards off the chair and dangling towards the ground as their newborn bodies kept shoveling hundreds of meals into their voracious maws.

She grabbed the paper stick which held the cotton candy and tried to climb up to get inside, only to notice the machine violently shaking as she touched it. Something was definitely wrong here, and Mabel was getting a bit worried.

15111112.content:
Unfortunately, Mabel would find no help from Dipper, as he was busy being attacked by a rogue Hot Dog machine! They were shooting into his mouth like a gattling gun, being restrained by metal tubes, his mouth forced open by the many sausages being shoved into him. They came in at such a powerful rate he couldn't consume them all in time before another batch came in, he was constantly growing fatter and fatter with no end in sight!

The two Pines twins were trapped, each one now heavily obese to the point of ripping out of their clothes from the sheer amount of lard being piled onto them. Just as they felt they were going to keep growing forever, the machines suddenly stopped. They miraculously ran out of food to feed them with, huzzah! They wobbled around, feeling up all their newly-added pudge and blubber.
"Hee hee... After all the force-feeding, this fat is pretty cool!" Mabel smiled, wobbling her gut around playfully. It seemed she was enjoying it a lot, much more than Dipper, who was in the middle of a panic attack.
"Oh no! I've ripped out of all my clothes, I can barely stand! I need to find Mabel, we need to get out of here, quick!" He stated, attempting to get up onto his feet. He managed to just barely stand up, and waddled his humongous body over towards where Mabel was, managing to find her pretty easily from the sounds of playful giggling and a groaning stomach. "Mabel, oh no, you got fat, too?"
"Yeah! Oohh, your tummy looks so cute and squishy! Bwop!" Mabel giggled, poking Dipper's giant belly. He shoved as much of his shirt down as possible to cover it, but didn't do that great a job of it.
"Mabel, this is serious! Something weird is going on in this carnival, and we need to get out before--!"

Before Dipper could finish, he...

He put the two young toddlers into stretchy, sparkling bikinis which showed off a lot of their fat but restrained their fatty breasts and ginormous asses. They felt tight, yet still comfortable, and made them look even cuter!
Dipper felt very embarrassed being in a skimpy bikini, feeling like some kind of girl, while Mabel thought it made her look even more adorable, much less awkward than being naked at least.
"You look great in those! Now, come along! It's time for your big show!" The ghostly ringleader spoke, levitating both kids with a strange, telekinetic ability. They were lifted into the big tent in the center, who knew what kind of diabolical scheme awaited for them inside?

Dipper was still nervous, trying to find ways to escape, while Mabel was just excited to see what the big show would entail. As they entered, the uproarious applause of several ghostly specters filled the seats, happy to see the obese toddlers.
"Welcome, one and all, to tonight's biggest attraction; The Insatiable Toddlers!" The ringleader spoke. "Give them any food, any object, anything at all and they will eat it, and grow fatter and fatter! Their bellies are large, but their appetite is larger! Feed them, feed them!"

The ghosts all clamored around to start feeding the children, starting with smaller, circus-themed foods like Hot Dogs, Pretzels, Elephant Ears and even some Burgers. A steady stream of food flowed into their mouths and fattened them up even more than ever before, much to the displeasure and pleasure of Dipper and Mabel respectively.
